text: Thou fair-haired angel of the evening, Now, whilst the sun rests on the mountains, light
Now, whilst the sun rests on the mountains, light%% Thy bright torch of love; thy radiant crown
Thy bright torch of love; thy radiant crown%% Put on, and smile upon our evening bed!
Put on, and smile upon our evening bed! Smile on our loves, and while thou drawest the
Smile on our loves, and while thou drawest the%% Blue curtains of the sky, scatter thy silver dew
Blue curtains of the sky, scatter thy silver dew%% On every flower that shuts its sweet eyes
On every flower that shuts its sweet eyes%% In timely sleep. Let thy west wing sleep on
In timely sleep. Let thy west wing sleep on%% The lake; speak silence with thy glimmering eyes,
The lake; speak silence with thy glimmering eyes, And wash the dusk with silver. Soon, full soon,
And wash the dusk with silver. Soon, full soon, Dost thou withdraw; then the wolf rages wide,
Dost thou withdraw; then the wolf rages wide, And the lion glares through the dun forest.
And the lion glares through the dun forest. The fleeces of our flocks are covered with
The fleeces of our flocks are covered with%% Thy sacred dew; protect with them with thine influence.
